name: Selder_Psalm
content:
Selder Psalm was a human that had a base on the planet Coruscant with known ties with the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars against the Galactic Republic. In 21 BBY, Senator Padmé Amidala of the Galactic Republic viewed them as a possible threat to her scheduled meeting with Arthurian delegates and showed Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano a datapad displaying a picture of Psalm, asking the Jedi to protect her and her guests during the meeting.
Psalm had gray hair, gray eyes, and fair skin. They wore an orange and red cloth.
Selder Psalm appeared on a datapad in the one-shot comic-book Star Wars: Forces of Destiny—Ahsoka & Padmé, published by IDW Publishing on January 24, 2018. The comic was written by Beth Revis and illustrated by Valentina Pinto.
